title: NATURE'S EFA: Omegas, 3, 6 and 9 Blend | NU-TEK Nutrition
description: NATURE'S EFA mixes Omega 3, 6 and 9 fatty acids sourced from fish, flax and borage oils. Omegas have been well studied for numerous potential health benefits.
cleaned_text: now we all have learned that healthy fats are vital for overall health. For those who understand and appreciate the benefits of a quality Essential Fatty Acid (EFA) supplement for daily use, NATURE'S EFA by NU-TEK Nutrition® has you covered. NATURE'S EFA offers a superior blend of Omega 3, 6 and 9 fatty acids derived from natural sources including fish, flax and borage oils. Also included in the formula are natural lemon oil (to combat those fishy-tasting burps typically associated with 'other' EFA type supplements) and extra virgin olive oil. Here's to optimal health! SUGGESTED USE: Take two (2) softgels with meals, twice daily. WARNING: This product is only intended for healthy adults, 18 years of age or older. Keep out of reach of children. Please consult your physician before taking if you have any pre-existing medical conditions or are taking any medication. Do not use if you are pregnant or nursing. Discontinue use and consult your healthcare professional if you experience any adverse reaction to this product. Do not use if safety seal is broken or missing. Store in a cool, dry place. ALLERGY INFORMATION: Contains fish (Sardines, Anchovies, Mackerel) and soy derivatives. Manufactured in a facility that processes milk, eggs, fish, shellfish, tree nuts, peanuts, wheat, and soy.
